agenda_items.title: Discussion of the resignation of City Manager, T.C. Broadnax, and a resolution appointing Kimberly Tolbert as Interim City Manager for the City of Dallas, effective at the close of business on June 3, 2024, to serve until the City Council selects and appoints the city manager
Consideration and discussion regarding the search process for and hiring of a candidate for the position of city manager
Discussion regarding process and schedule for performance evaluations for City Attorney, Tammy L. Palomino, City Secretary, Bilierae Johnson, and City Auditor, Mark Swann
